section:
== Administrator: create example project
Also for testing create a new Java project called _com.vogella.gerrit.example_ in Eclipse that gets stored in a local Git repository. Add a few classes to it.
The following pushes the changes directly to the Git repository without a change in Gerrit. Administrators are allowed to do this.
Afterwards push the local Git repository to Gerrit by selecting menu:Team[Remote > Push]. Enter the following URL ssh://<userid>@localhost:29418/demo/gerrittest.git in the wizard and press the _Next_ button.
image::gerrit_initialpush10.png" scale="40" />
Initial push to Gerrit
On the next page, click the _Add All Branches Spec_ button.
image::gerrit_initialpush20.png" scale="40" />
Initial push to Gerrit
Press the _Next_ button and on the last wizard page the _Finish_ button.
